titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Right Honourable the House of Peeres, in the Abbey at Westminster, the 26. of Novemb. 1645. Being the day appointed for solemne and publique humiliation. / By Jer: Burroughes. Published by order of the said House.
titleStmt.author: Burroughs, Jeremiah, 1599-1646.

titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Right Honourable the House of Peeres, in the Abbey at Westminster, the 26. of Novemb. 1645. Being the day appointed for solemne and publique humiliation. / By Jer: Burroughes. Published by order of the said House.
titleStmt.author: Burroughs, Jeremiah, 1599-1646.

notesStmt.note: Thomason received his copy in late 1645. Wing has 1646; the McAlpin Catalogue lists under 1646.
Annotation on Thomason copy: the I in imprint date is crossed out; "1645".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
